meanings.definition: a type of tree found in coastal regions
meanings.sent1: The milkwoods along the shore provide shade for picnics.
meanings.sent2: Many birds nest in the branches of the milkwoods near the beach.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorns in the milkwoods.
meanings.sent4: The milkwoods stood tall like guardians of the coastline.
meanings.sent5: The scent of salt mixed with the sweet fragrance of the milkwoods.

meanings.definition: the wood of the milkwood tree
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carved beautiful figurines from the milkwoods.
meanings.sent2: The furniture in the cabin was made of polished milkwoods.
meanings.sent3: The old sailor claimed his ship was built from enchanted milkwoods.
meanings.sent4: The milkwoods whispered stories of the sea in the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The milkwoods' grain shimmered in the sunlight like liquid gold.

meanings.sent1: The milkwoods in the park attract many visitors with their beauty.
meanings.sent2: Children love to climb the sturdy branches of the milkwoods.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat chased a squirrel up the milkwoods.
meanings.sent4: The milkwoods swayed gently in the breeze, a dance of nature.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the milkwoods rustled like a soft lullaby in the wind.
